openscap.profile_description: This profile defines a baseline that aligns to the "Level 2 - Server" configuration from the Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 Benchmark™, v2.0.0, released 2022-02-23.  This profile includes Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 CIS Benchmarks™ content.
openscap.profile_name: CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 Benchmark for Level 2 - Server
